refnamediv.refpurpose: Get the current after-touch value for this channel.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Get the current after-touch value for this channel.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: imin (optional, default=0) -- minimum limit on values obtained.
imax (optional, default=127) -- maximum limit on values obtained.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: Get the current after-touch value for this channel.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the aftouch opcode. It uses the file aftouch.csd.
Example of the aftouch opcode.
See the sections Real-time Audio and Command Line Flags for more information on using command line flags.

refsect1.title: See Also
refsect1.para: ampmidi, cpsmidi, cpsmidib, midictrl, notnum, octmidi, octmidib, pchbend, pchmidi, pchmidib, veloc
